## Why use GitHub for project management?

::::: columns
::: column
-   Issues and projects stoke collaboration
-   Issues act as short-term to-do lists
-   Projects capture longer-term goals and organize short-term issues
:::

::: column
![https://albertobasalo.medium.com/project-management-with-github-issues-and-projects-cb8eb6da966f](images/paste-54.png)
:::

## Issues

::::: columns
::: column
-   Tasks for things to do
-   Place to provide detail
-   Checklists, labels, tags
-   Assign to collaborators
:::

::: column
![](images/paste-55.png)
:::

## Projects

::::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
-   Group issues to view everything together
-   Work across repositories
-   Show progress by collaborators
:::

::: {.column width="70%"}
